shortdesc.p: Welcome to breakfast at Marjan's! Today I have left a set of recipes for you to follow, so that your experience this weekend is that much more easy and relaxing. The following recipes will provide you with an energetic start to your day that will leave you satisfied until lunch! After you have enjoyed your breakfasts, a clean-up guide can be found to help with the little or big messes you may have made in your breakfast adventures. A troubleshooting and reference guide have been included for your convenience.

This colorful and flavorful hash is sure to provide everyone with an array of flavors and tastes to satisfy any morning hunger. Ingredients are easily interchangeable, making this recipe fun and dynamic.

These wraps are portable and easy to share. Enjoy them while reading the morning paper, getting ready for work, or over the breakfast table with loved ones. Packed with a variet of ingrediets, these wraps are customizable and fun to make.

These crispy quinoa cakes are a twist on the traditional sausage patty found at breakfast. These savory cakes are packed with fresh vegetables and will be great served hot or room temperature. They are easily enjoyed alone or with a side of hash and a smoothie

This smoothie is an easy breakfast that is full of all your essential nutrients for the day. The healthy greens are hardly noticeable with the addition of naturally sweet fruits. This is a great breakfast to make in a rush or to enjoy in the house on a slow morning.

This rich and robust drink is full of many herbs and spices that will warm up the start to any day. Chai lattes are known for their comforting qualities and are easier to make than taking a trip down to your local barista
The recipes provided have been modified for each user. To learn more about the recipes used in today's breafast guide, visit the following links below:
